name: The Flatformer
description: The Flatformer is, despite the name, not a platformer. Instead, it is a mix of a platformer and strategy as the game requires some thinking as you, the player, progresses. There is also quick thinking involved, as there are other things in the game that want to prevent you from reaching the goal (a yellow energy crystal), or is it that those 'things', are being manipulated by another entity....?
